column4: daughter of carlos and esmeralda corona
column5: was born and passed gently into the arms of jesus on june 10
column6: 2015. she is survived by her loving parents
column7: as well as her maternal grandparents
column8: maria & jamie garcia sr. and her paternal grandparents
column9: teresa & rafael corona. gabriella gave them a lifetime of love during her short stay on earth. condolences may be sent to her family through our website.
